text.en: You are the regent of Orgyen, an emanated tamer of beings,
Who actualized the dharmakāya that is present as the ground
text.en-trans: zhir né chöku ngöngyur rigpé khar

text.en: And, within the space of awareness, gained vast assurance that saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are the display of purity and equalness —
text.en-trans: khordé dak nyam rolpé ding chen tob

text.en: Dudjom Dorje, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: düjom dorjé zhab la solwa deb
